text:
[Verse]
In the night so wild so free
Electric skies speak to me
Bright flashes light the way
Chasing shadows night to day

[Verse 2]
Raindrops falling on my face
Thunder rolls with heavy bass
Feel the power feel the beat
Dancing laughter in the street

[Chorus]
Lightning love it's in the air
Feel its force everywhere
Heartbeats match the flashing lights
Sparks fly in these electric nights

[Verse 3]
Sky on fire hearts ablaze
Lost in this electric haze
Feel the rhythm in my soul
Let the lightning take control

[Bridge]
Storms may come storms may go
But this love continues to grow
In each flash in each spark
We're together in the dark

[Chorus]
Lightning love it's in the air
Feel its force everywhere
Heartbeats match the flashing lights
Sparks fly in these electric nights
title: Lightning Love
